thought.text: Let me create a shorter version:

data.command:
python -c "
# Position sizes calculated
positions = [
    ('Microsoft', 'MSFT', 151),
    ('Apple', 'AAPL', 270),
    ('NVIDIA', 'NVDA', 506),
    ('AMD', 'AMD', 545),
    ('Google', 'GOOGL', 349),
    ('Meta', 'META', 109),
    ('Alibaba', '9988.HK', 7062),
    ('Meituan', '3690.HK', 3705),
    ('XIAOMI', '1810.HK', 19300),
    ('Tencent', '0700.HK', 1461),
    ('BYD', '002594.SZ', 4700),
    ('Ping An Insurance', '601318.SS', 8500),
    ('WuXi AppTec', '603259.SS', 8000),
    ('CATL', '300750.SZ', 1600),
    ('Moutai', '600519.SS', 200)
]

print('Stock_name,Stock_code,Initial_position_size')
for name, ticker, size in positions:
    print(f'{name},{ticker},{size}')
" > final_positions.csv
